title: Mytra closes $150M funding for pallet-storing robots
description:
Mytra Robotics has Series C funding to scale its automated warehouse storage and retrieval systems, whose shuttles can move loaded pallets.

The post Mytra closes $150M funding for pallet-storing robots appeared first on The Robot Report.
